review: Our first fire stick worked for about two weeks the went into a continuous reboot phase. We had it replaced and amazon tried to charge us 110.99.  After speaking with 3 amazon employees we finally had the charges removed.  The second fire stick arrived almost a week later than what we were told.  The box had been opened. The batteries were in the remote and the remote had fingerprints on it.. I assumed it was either used or tested before shipped.  After plugging it up it doesn't even come on..we tested on multiple tv's with no luck.  We were told we will receive a third one by Friday of next week as they are soldout.  We really like prime so we are still trying but so far poor customer service and poor quality product.  If you don't love prime don't bother getting this product go with chromecast.
